reviews.review:
[h1] Portal 2-speaking name for lovers of games such as Half-Life and CS 1.6. [/h1]
So I went in in the morning and, running through various rooms to an energetic soundtrack, did not notice how evening came.
The next day, my old life seemed strange, because I want to use the portal and get to work or to the store for chips and cola.
[spoiler] the game is so not demanding that I was able to run it on my favorite calculator Casio fx-CP400 [/spoiler]
es ist mega toll gemacht.besonders das ende war episch.ich empfehle es weiter.
I saved science with my friend and i loved it
Love to burn more braincells? Here's the game for you. You can grab another friend to burn your braincells together as well.

O jogo √© muito bom, a m√∫sica e a dublagem s√£o √≥timas, gr√°ficos muito bons pra √©poca. A hist√≥ria √© simples, mas mesmo assim muito boa, com reviravoltas inesperadas, piadas a todo momento e com personagem carism√°ticos. A mec√¢nica de uso dos portais √© √∫nica da franquia Portal. O jogo sempre implementa algo novo na gameplay, torretas, gel de pulo, gel de velocidade, gel que libera as paredes para usar os portais, cubos, cubos que refletem, raios lasers, trampolins, paredes transparentes, tubos que te levam para uma dire√ß√£o que pode ser invertida. Todas essas coisas v√£o sendo implementadas durante o jogo, te impedindo de achar as salas de teste repetitivas. Tamb√©m tem um modo cooperativo que vem junto com o jogo, mas ainda n√£o testei. Recomendo muito, por√©m acho melhor ter jogado o primeiro jogo antes, pois esse tem elementos mais complexos, ent√£o √© melhor jogar o anterior para n√£o chegar nesse perdido, se for comprar o primeiro jogo, recomendo comprar o pacote orange box.
Portal... what to say, I love the story and puzzles.

Fun puzzle game, singleplayer and multiplayer. Good story, interesting characters and lore, Wheatly is extremely goofy, even when evil, and ends on a good note. Multiplayer is very fun to goof off with friends, and I'd recommend it for even the multiplayer alone.

Great story and an overall super enjoyable game. I haven't finished it yet but the puzzles are entertaining yet challenging and as I mentioned before the story line is just awesome. I would definitely recommend playing through both Portal games, as it will help solidify the story game even more, but if you want a fun yet somewhat moderately-difficult game, this game definitely hits all the marks in my book.

This game is incredibly well crafted. Playing through it feels like playing through a movie. It‚Äôs the most immersed I‚Äôve ever been in a game. Most of the time, games that are heavy on story will have extensive dialogue or intrude upon gameplay with cutscenes. Portal 2 instead melds the story with the gameplay. On the topic of gameplay, it‚Äôs great! The puzzles are all unique and feel fair to solve, and the game adds new mechanics that are used creatively. 

TL;DR this game absolutely nails story and gameplay, and never sacrifices one for the other.

Also worth mentioning, this game has an amazing co-op campaign. It‚Äôs constantly putting players in positions where they‚Äôre responsible for the life of another player. It makes for the funniest co-op session I‚Äôve had in a while. (Once I disabled the low-budget in game voice chat and used Discord instead.)
